caption.p: Differential flavonoid metabolite analysis on the basis of OPLS-DA. ( aâ€“ f) OPLS-DA model plots for the comparison groups GP and RB, GP and MY, ZP and GP, ZP and MY, ZP and RB, MY and RB. The t1 (abscissa) represents the predicted scores of PC1, and to1 (ordinate) represents the scores of the orthogonal principal components.
